messages.subject: was Introduction...yeah NE
messages.msgSnippet: Hi fellow New Englander, Olivia!  We re in New Hampshire after living my entire life in Indiana (both great places in their own ways). Where are you?! Diana A.
messages.messageBody:
Hi fellow New Englander, Olivia! We're in New Hampshire after living my
entire life in Indiana (both great places in their own ways).
Where are you?!

Diana A.
"the world is our classroom"
--apt.in NH; house in Indy
SAHM to C-C (6) and Libby (2)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

"Cleaning your house while the kids are little is like shoveling the
sidewalk before it stops snowing."
---Phyllis Diller

----Original Message Follows----
From: Olivia <liv2learn@...>
...on the other coast. I just wanted to say welcome and I
have a 6 1/2 yo who is just today starting to show the smallest glimmers of
coming out of a "doing nothing" stage. I can't wait to see what happens!
Olivia
In New England

At 03:39 PM 09/24/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Lisa Scott and Kai" <airsignfamily@...>
>
>Hello
>we are an unschooling family in SanDiego CA and just subbed to this list.
>Would like to meet with other families in the area--Kai is 7 and wants to
>meet other kids like himself. Also am just glad to be here and see ...
